definition: to protect/to defend/to guard against/to prevent
ministry/department/section/part/division/troops/board/classifier for works of literature, films, machines etc

sentences.english: And what's best is for Don Rumsfeld to remain as the Secretary of Defense,"-- Washington, April 18, 2006
sentences.chinese: 现在的‘最好’就是让拉姆斯菲尔德续任国防部长。

sentences.english: Indian Defense Minister Arackaparambil Kurian Antony says that has ramifications on this side of the border.
sentences.chinese: 印度国防部长安东尼说，这些镇压对印度也有影响。

sentences.english: The advice of the Surgeons General was made available to the Assistant to the Secretary of Defense as necessary.
sentences.chinese: 卫生局长的建议有必要被提供给国防部长助理。

sentences.english: The Defense Administry said the attacks office was destroyed, at least 42 people injured.
sentences.chinese: 国防部长说一个税务所被炸毁，至少42人受伤。

sentences.english: The secretary of defense briefed the president on the enemy's strength.
sentences.chinese: 国防部长向总统简略汇报敌人的兵力。

sentences.english: This will be the last time the U. S. Defense Secretary Gates, who visited Russia.
sentences.chinese: 这将是盖茨最后一次以美国国防部长身份访问俄罗斯。

sentences.english: The recent successful visit to China by Secretary Gates gave a boost to the military-to-military relationship between the two countries.
sentences.chinese: 盖茨国防部长近日成功访华，促进了两军关系发展。

sentences.english: He is a former defence secretary of the United States and a grandee of the Democratic Party.
sentences.chinese: 他是美国前国防部长，也是民主党的显要人物。

sentences.english: Ho Ying-chin had been the Kuomintang's chief of the general staff and minister of national defence.
sentences.chinese: 何应钦，曾任国民党军参谋总长和国防部长。

sentences.english: Barack Obama Appoints Artest as Defense Secretary.
sentences.chinese: 奥巴马指定阿泰为国防部长。

sentences.english: And what's best is for Don Rumsfeld to remain as the Secretary of Defense
sentences.chinese: 现在的‘最好’就是让拉姆斯菲尔德续任国防部长。

sentences.english: Secretary Cohen, thank you for your kind introduction.
sentences.chinese: 首先，我感谢科恩前国防部长的热情介绍。

sentences.english: His first act as secretary? Reinstating the draft.
sentences.chinese: 如果他首次担任国防部长，他必将恢复征兵服役。

sentences.english: The Defence Minister made another interesting remark.
sentences.chinese: 这位国防部长还做出过另外一些有趣的评论。

sentences.english: Investigation report is released, Defense Minister Keli He announced his resignation.
sentences.chinese: 调查报告公布后，国防部长克利赫宣布辞职。

sentences.english: We blame the generals, the secretary of defense, the Joint Chiefs of Staff.
sentences.chinese: 我们责骂将军，国防部长，参谋联席会。

definition: abbr. for 國防部長|国防部长[guo2 fang2 bu4 zhang3], Minister of Defense
air commodore/top commander of air force
commander-in-chief/top military commander for a country or theater of operations
